comment.author: 66311327@N05
comment._content: "Jules Charles Toussaint Védrines (1881–1919) was an early French aviator, notable for being the first pilot to fly at more than 100 mph and for winning the Gordon Bennett Trophy race in 1912." en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Jules_V%C3%A9drines

comment.author: 35014516@N03
comment._content: B-59:  Thanks for providing us with this aviator's full name.  We will include it in our next update.
